title: Remove Maui Lane logo/icon rendering from the UI

requirements.text: Remove/disable Maui Lane Care Home logo rendering in the authenticated app shell header so the UI uses a text-only header (no logo and no fallback-to-icon behavior).

quotes: remove the logo as they don't appear

acceptanceCriteria: The Maui app header no longer renders an image element for the logo/icon and displays the title as text only.
There is no broken image placeholder in the header on any route.
The app no longer attempts to load /assets/generated/maui-lane-logo.dim_512x512.png or /assets/generated/maui-lane-app-icon.dim_256x256.png as part of the header rendering.

requirements.text: Remove/disable Maui Lane generated app-icon usage as the site favicon in the HTML entrypoint (do not reference the generated icon file in the <link rel="icon"> tag).

quotes: remove the logo as they don't appear

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html no longer references %BASE_URL%assets/generated/maui-lane-app-icon.dim_256x256.png as the favicon.
Loading the app does not trigger a favicon request for the generated Maui icon file.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui (immutable paths).
Keep Internet Identity login gating intact.
nonGoals: Fixing or troubleshooting why the logo files are not loading/rendering.
Creating new brand assets or changing the existing generated image files.
